FuncDef:
The zero-metric-check command configures a device to reject the route with metric 0.
The undo zero-metric-check command configures a device to accept the route with metric 0. The zero-metric-check command configures a device to reject the route with metric 0. The undo zero-metric-check command configures a device to accept the route with metric 0. By default, routes with the metric being 0 are rejected.
